Description: Scenes from the life of Jesus Christ; in the background is the Crucifixion with Christ's side pierced by a spear and blood pouring from the wounds; most prominently is the Lamentation in the foreground Christ accompanied by the Virgin, St John the Baptist and others; other scenes include the circumcision and Christ in the temple with the elders; beyond is the flight into Egypt, Christ carrying the cross and the deposition Engraving
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (216)
